tool_description: Parses raw laboratory data from various formats (HL7, CSV, XML) into standardized structured records for further processing.

input_file_path.description: Path to the laboratory data file to be parsed

file_format.description: Format of input file: HL7, CSV, XML, JSON

error_messages: Invalid file path: Ensure the file path exists and is accessible.
Unsupported file format: Use one of [HL7, CSV, XML, JSON].
File parsing error: Check file integrity and format consistency.
Encoding error: Verify file encoding matches the specified parameter.
usage: Provide the file path and format of laboratory data. The tool will parse and return structured lab records with standardized field names.

parsed_records_count.description: Number of successfully parsed lab records

patient_ids.description: List of unique patient identifiers found in the data

test_types.description: List of unique test types identified

parsing_status.description: Overall parsing status: SUCCESS, PARTIAL, FAILED
